author: RTÉ News
title: At a glance: Latest coronavirus global developments
description: Follow the latest updates on the impact Covid-19 is having on nations around the world.
content:
Japan has reported 556 new cases of Covid-19, surpassing the total of 10,000 about three months after the first case was detected in the country.
Nearly one-third of the domestic cases come from Tokyo, where the daily surge has overburdened hospitals, trigge… [+5308 chars]
